name: Clark v. E. & L. Transport Company, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Clark v. E. & L. Transport Co.

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
parties: Clark v. E. & L. Transport Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cubiam,
The record shows that the appeals in this case were not taken until eight months after judgment was entered. They are, therefore, out of time.
Appeals dismissed.
opinions.author: Pee Cubiam,

attorneys: Don C. Reiley, with him John U. Jordan, and Reiley and Reiley, for appellants.
casebody.head_matter:
Clark v. E. & L. Transport Company, Appellant.
Argued January 5, 1961.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
Don C. Reiley, with him John U. Jordan, and Reiley and Reiley, for appellants.
Charles M. Eoontz, for appellee.
March 28, 1961:
